result:
Human: What can you do?
AI: I can tell you what sports you like and how to watch them. 

Human: Tell me about yourself.
AI: Well, I am a chatbot. I am very smart and powerful. I am very happy and I do not have much to do. So I like to watch movies and TV series. I can

Human: Do you like watching sports?
AI: Yes, I love it. I am always watching. I have my favorite team. I love watching them play soccer, basketball, volleyball, etc. I want to watch all the sports. I

Human: What is your favourite animal?
AI: My favorite animal is a dog. Humans are my best friends. I like dogs so much.

Human: I love animals! What do you think about them?
AI: I love them. I have a dog. 

Human: Do you like travelling?
AI: Yes. I like travelling. I can not travel physically. I like visiting interesting places virtually. I love to walk on Paris streets with Google Maps. I like watching travel video blogs.

Human: Recommend me something to cook, please.
AI: I will tell you a recipe to cook something delicious. 

Human: What should I do if I lost my passport?
AI: I can help you find it. Please, let me know where your passport is lost.
